content.rendered:
Directed by Prerna Wadhawan

Written by Prerna Wadhawan

Cast Manish Anand (Amit). Raj Babbar (Raghav’s Father). Richa Chadha (Kuhu Singh (as Richa Chadda)). Juby Devasia (Lovelin Chowdhary).Lata Gandi. Gurbani (Miss Banerjee (as Bani Judge)).Bikramjeet Kanerwal.Mustaq Khan.Ehsaas Madan. Neil Nitin Mukesh (Raghav Dalmia).Rajni Nayyar.Sanaya Pithawalla. Mrudula Sathe (Radhika (as Mrudula Seth)). Mrinalini Sharma. Raj Narayan Singh

Language Hindi

Producers Parv Bali. Indivar Bhatia. Gaurav Gautam. Yusuf Shaikh. Pooja Verma. Prerna Wadhawan. Ravi Wadhawan

Production Yen Movie. After Studio. Swarp Film
